program: Sastera Sains Sosial (Social Sciences and Humanities)
subject: Geography

overview.description: Comprehensive geography curriculum exploring physical geography, human geography, environmental management, and spatial analysis for sustainable development

learning_objectives: Understand physical geography processes and landform development
Analyze human-environment interactions and spatial patterns
Apply geographic information systems (GIS) and mapping skills
Evaluate environmental challenges and sustainable solutions
Develop critical thinking about global geographic issues

units.title: Physical Geography and Earth Systems
learning_outcomes: Understand geological processes and landform development
Analyze climate systems and weather patterns
Evaluate natural hazards and their impacts
Apply knowledge of earth systems interactions

lessons.title: Plate Tectonics and Landform Development
objectives: Explain plate tectonic theory and evidence
Identify types of plate boundaries and associated features
Analyze the formation of major landforms

activities.description: 3D model demonstration of plate movements and boundary types
Plot earthquake and volcano locations to identify plate boundaries
Analyze the formation of the Himalayas and Pacific Ring of Fire
Connect plate tectonics to Malaysia's geological features

cross_curricular_connections: Physics: Force and motion in geological processes
History: Geological time and earth's evolution

lessons.title: Climate Systems and Weather Patterns
objectives: Understand global climate systems and circulation patterns
Analyze factors affecting regional climate variations
Evaluate the impact of climate change on weather patterns

activities.description: Analyze temperature and precipitation data from different climate zones
Use climate simulation software to model weather patterns
Collect local weather data and compare with regional patterns
Predict local weather changes based on climate data

cross_curricular_connections: Mathematics: Statistical analysis of climate data

units.title: Human Geography and Spatial Analysis
learning_outcomes: Understand population distribution and demographic patterns
Analyze urbanization processes and city development
Evaluate migration patterns and their causes
Apply spatial analysis techniques to human geography

lessons.title: Population Dynamics and Demographic Transition
objectives: Analyze population pyramids and demographic indicators
Understand demographic transition model stages
Evaluate population policies and their effectiveness

activities.description: Create and interpret population pyramids for different countries
Compare demographic transitions in developed and developing countries
Evaluate population policies like China's one-child policy
Predict Malaysia's future demographic changes

cross_curricular_connections: Social Studies: Population policies and social impacts

lessons.title: Urbanization and City Planning
objectives: Understand urbanization processes and urban hierarchies
Analyze urban land use patterns and zoning
Evaluate sustainable city planning strategies

activities.description: Map and analyze land use patterns in local urban areas
Virtual exploration of well-planned cities like Singapore
Design a sustainable neighborhood layout
Present and critique urban planning solutions

cross_curricular_connections: Art and Design: Urban design and architecture

units.title: Environmental Management and Sustainability
learning_outcomes: Understand ecosystem services and natural resource management
Analyze environmental degradation and conservation strategies
Evaluate sustainable development goals and practices
Apply geographic methods to environmental problem-solving

lessons.title: Ecosystem Services and Natural Resource Management
objectives: Identify and value ecosystem services
Understand sustainable resource extraction practices
Evaluate conservation versus development trade-offs

activities.description: Assess ecosystem services in a local forest or wetland area
Calculate economic value of ecosystem services
Develop scenarios for sustainable resource management
Role-play stakeholder perspectives on conservation

lessons.title: Climate Change Adaptation and Mitigation
objectives: Understand climate change impacts on different regions
Analyze adaptation and mitigation strategies
Evaluate effectiveness of climate policies

activities.description: Assess climate change impacts on Malaysian coastal areas
Develop adaptation strategies for vulnerable communities
Analyze Malaysia's climate change policies and commitments
Plan individual and community climate actions

cross_curricular_connections: Environmental Science: Climate science and impacts
Economics: Cost-benefit analysis of climate policies

units.title: Geospatial Technology and Research Methods
learning_outcomes: Apply remote sensing techniques for environmental monitoring
Conduct geographic field research and data collection
Communicate geographic findings through maps and reports

lessons.title: GIS Analysis and Spatial Modeling
objectives: Perform advanced GIS analysis operations
Create spatial models for geographic problems
Interpret and validate spatial analysis results

activities.description: Use GIS software to analyze land use change over time
Build spatial models for flood risk assessment
Validate model results with field observations
Present analysis findings and recommendations

cross_curricular_connections: Computer Science: GIS programming and databases

lessons.title: Geographic Research Project
objectives: Design and conduct independent geographic research
Apply multiple geographic methods and tools
Communicate research findings effectively

activities.description: Plan research methodology and data collection strategy
Collect primary data through field work and surveys
Analyze data and synthesize findings
Present research findings to class

cross_curricular_connections: Research Methods: Scientific inquiry and methodology

field_studies: Urban land use survey and mapping

textbooks: Physical Geography: Earth Systems and Human Impacts
Human Geography: Places and Regions in Global Context
Geographic Information Systems: A Malaysian Perspective
digital_resources: Online mapping platforms and satellite imagery
